name: Let’s Octopus: Sport Fishing
description:
Let’s Octopus : Sport Fishing
is a most popular casual games. It is much better than others Octopus Fishing.It is not only very awesome,but it had given us more happiness time.It becomes a classic game to everyone and can be played anywhere.
In this game you're a gold Octopus and your mission is to collect the fish by pressing the screen, the same way you activate the sticks of dynamite which you can use when something else than fish will get in octopus eat. Are you ready?

*OVER 30 VARIETIES OF FISH
* THE DEEPER YOU GET THE BIGGER THE PRIZE
*CHECKOUT THE UNDERWATER CAMERA
* GET THE BIGGEST CATCH
* ENDLESS ENTERTAINMENT WITH CRAZY, ADORABLE, WITTY, HUMOROUS AND LOVABLE ANIMATION.
